msg: Fixed a failing test on windows by checking that a /tmp directory exist on the machine before launching the test

msg: LABS-351 : better handling of underlying values in velocity html escape

author: jwaldman
msg: implement getStyles in RenderingContext to return null instead of having it be an abstract method. This is for backward compatibility in case someone has implemented RenderingContext. We don't want their code to break.
